reviews.review: I just saw this movie last and I was completely blown away, Avengers Infinity War really packed a punch and put a lot into this two and a half hour movie, this was better than Age Of Ultron. This wasn’t just your typical hero against villain fighting movie, there was a lot of story to this and all of the characters had their moments. Josh Brolin as Thanos was just so good. He’s the best villain out of these Marvel movies. Even though you were terrified of him, there was a logic to his madness and you sympathized with him. There are a lot of theories out as to what will will happen in the sequel due to be released next year. It’s fun to read but that’s a long wait, but at least we have Ant-Man and the Wasp in July.
Great story from start to finish

THE SCRIPT IS JUST BAD WRITING. TAKE LOKI FOR EXAMPLE. THE GOD OF MISCHIEF, THE MOST WITTY OF ALL GODS, AFTER WATCHING THE HULK QUICKLY LOSE AGAINST THANOS, TAKES OUT A SMALL KNIFE & TRIES TO STAB HIM. THIS WAS TRULY SO UNCHARACTERISTIC OF LOKI. HE'S TOO SMART, TOO CUNNING FOR THAT. BETTER BE MORE TO THIS OR SHAME ON THE WRITERS FOR NOT KNOWING THE CHARACTER THEIR WRITING ABOUT.

This is one of the best marvel movies out of them all. The story and plot had meaning and  conisquences for everything. All the heroes do great again as usual but the villain Thanos was extremely well done. He is given lots of screen time and was very well developed. The story moves in a much darker pace and end leaving a gut wrenching feeling. Lots of fun, do not miss.

The script is just bad writing. take loki for example. The GOD of mischief, the most witty of all Gods, after watching the Hulk quickly lose against Thanos, takes out a small knife & tries to stab him. This was truly so uncharacteristic of Loki. He's too smart, too cunning for that. Better be more to this or shame on the writers for not knowing the character their writing about.
litrally the best Marvel movie ever nothing beats this

Great action and an all-star cast. I appreciated that the biggest story arc was centered on a few characters that are not the "big names," and the heartbreaking ending left us on a fantastic but painful cliffhanger until the next movie.
The characters are great, the plot is ok, the ending is non-existent. This is half a movie with a very unsatisfying lack of conclusion.
This movie was alot of fun....sad and crazy but fun! can't wait till the 2nd film!
